inn1.comm: goes pretty wide way outside off to start with a wide
another one, fullish delivery again well outside off for a wide
survives by a whisker, not the batsman, Abbott's delivery as it was just inside the wide line, maybe on it
on track, finally, good length ball shaping in towards off and it's defended by Tamim on the back foot
touch fuller outside off, pushed into the covers off the front foot
errs on the leg side with a fullish delivery, worked to square leg with the swing
on off side again, Tamim prods forward and helps the ball to the off side
touch wider outside off and Tamim lets it go to the keeper. No runs off the bat yet
fullish delivery on the stumps, flicked away to midwicket where Miller stops it with a dive to his left
142kmph, slightly back of length and towards the pads, helped to midwicket again off the back foot
on the leg side again, flicked away in the air behind square on the leg side for one
134.5kph, slightly slower from Rabada, it's on the leg side from back of length and Tamim cleverly helps the ball fine down the leg side for four, but for leg byes
142.2kph, much more accurate now - length delivery angled across outside off, Tamim pokes and misses
141.3kph, ends with a bouncer, can't end the over actually as it's a wide for height as Tamim ducked under it
good ball to end the over, length ball going away and Tamim leaves with his bat hidden behind the pads
length delivery on the off stump, Sarkar defends it on the off side
throws his bat at it as he gets width and the ball flies over slip for four! He got a chance to free his arms, went hard at it and the ball went well over Amla at wide slip
bit too full on middle stump now and flicked beautifully without much effort on the leg side, between midwicket and square leg
another wide from Abbott, this one down the leg side with some swing
full and wide outside off, Sarkar leans forward for a big drive but misses
angling away from length outside off, driven to cover without much footwork
swing and a miss again, good length ball outside off, no footwork and he swings and misses
nice ball from Rabada, on length and outside off so Tamim lets it go
mixes it up with a quick short ball, Tamim looked to play n then swayed out of the line in the end
good bounce this time outside off, touch back of length, some room, Tamim looks to cut it square but is beaten again
138kph bowled'im, first ODI wicket for Rabada! Tamim played the wrong line there as Rabada pitched it up on middle and off, Tamim maybe thought it would hold its line but it went on to hit off.
two in two for Rabada, not much of a celebration though, just a wide grin on his face! He angled it into the pads, Litton flicked it away but straight to Behardien at midwicket for an easy catch

he's done it, he's getting mobbed by his team-mates for that hat-trick and there's absolute silence at the ground! Quick ball into the pads again, not as full as the one that got Litton, this one on good length and the batsman is beaten on the back foot in an attempt to work it to leg. Misses, hit on the pads, finger goes up!
squares him up a bit on the back foot with some shape, Sarkar defends on the off side
short ball, Sarkar smacks it with a pull to the leg side and it bounces once before reaching deep midwicket
pitched up outside off, Shakib leans forward and drives it beautifully between cover point and point for four
shapes it away outside off again, another forward lean and this time helped to third man for one
length delivery on the off stump, Sarkar defends on the back foot
pulls the short ball again, mistimes it a bit towrds mid-on
pitched up o the pads, flicked away nicely in the air and Miller runs to his left from deep square leg to stop it with a dive
some room on the off side, driven elegsntly to cover point off the front foot
just over point! It was outside off again, Sarkar drove tentatively in the air and it went just over leaping Rossouw
138.7kph, some movement off the pitch from back of length on middle stump, he defends off the back foot
good stop at short fine leg as Rabada erred on line, it was on the leg side, Sarkar worked it off the hips and Morris put in a dive in the circle
scoops the short ball moving away over and wide of slips to third man for one
beautifully timed for four! It was going away from him outside off, he got some room and helped it with the angle and used the pace to send it past point for four
cracking four this time! Gets room with a short ball, gets time and he gets on top of it to cut it right in between point and cover point
slightly closer to off stump, he looks to cut it again, but without footwork, and misses
fullish and just outside off, driven down to mid off
misfield at short fine leg, he awkwardly played the incoming short ball to Imran Tahir who let the ball through him for two runs
delicately plays the ball from outside off to third man for one
quick and back of length just outside off, pushed into the covers

another one for Rabada, probably the biggest one so far after Sarkar was counterattacking! It looked like and innocuous delivery outside off on length, and Sarkar simply chipped it to Duminy at cover, without any footwork. Low catch taken nicely
nice delivery on the off stump, Mushy stays back and defends to cover
back of length now with enough room, Mushy steers it to third man
141kph, incoming delivery, nearly a yorker on leg stump, and it's pushed down to mid-on
short of length towards the hips, worked away to fine leg for one
back of length with some room, steered straight to gully
slower ball and closer to off stump, he goes back and defends carefully
cracking shot! He stayed back in the crease for the back of length ball, had room and cut it fiercely to send it crashing between point and third man
down the leg side now, deflects off the pad to the keeper who dives to stop it
mixes it up with another slower ball outside off, Shakib looks to cut and misses
he pitches it short, Shakib pulls and gets a top edge to square leg, but both fielders were just sent back, so it lands safely
on the pads at 140.7kph, worked towards fine leg for one by Shakib
good ball, just back of length outside off, Mushy pokes and withdraws just in time
outside off again, pushed to cover off the back foot this time
accurate delivery on off stump, no room, and Mushy defends on the back foot
top edge for four! Short ball coming in, Mushy pivots on the back foot to hook, gets an edge and it flies well over QDK for four. Luck
back of length outside off, Mushy turns it to midwicket region

wicket first ball? Umpire says no, Amla reviews straightaway! This length delivery pitched on the leg stump and was turning, hit him in front of leg as he tried to flick and was probably going down leg, looked close on first look. Going down leg and over, says HawkEye

gets an edge now, Shakib leaned forward for the ball well outside off, Shakib pushed at it and first slip would have taken it but there's nobody there. Rabada chases and dives to slide it in, just in time. He has bowled five overs by the way
another appeal for lbw as Mushy plays a premeditated paddle for the ball on off stump, but struck around the knee roll just outside off
flatter delivery down the leg side for a wide
full and flighted on the leg stump, driven down to long on for one
googly turning in from length around off, Mushy presses forward and blocks
drives it down the ground to long-off with the turn for one
on length outside off, pushes to point
sharp turn as the ball comes in towards middle stump, Mushy makes room and cuts to point
too full outside off, driven nicely to cover where amla gets a hand to it
outside off with some room, he cuts it to cover point
tossed up on off stump, Shakib leans forward and pushes it to cover point
touch shorter on off stump, steered towards point now
length delivery on middle stump, defends it to leg
full and flighted on middle stump, driven down to long-off now
pitched up on off and middle, he sweeps it with the turn to fine leg
around off stump now, driven into the covers
almost gets him! This one turned in from middle stump, Shakib made room to cut and got an inner edge just past leg stump
gets room now as he drives away from the body, it goes to short third man and actually past him for two
turning in towards leg stump, edge goes off the pad to the leg side in the air, no close-in fielder
short ball on the leg side, it's turning too and Mushy pulls it to deep fine leg
middle stump line, he goes back and cuts towards point
presses forward now and pushes the ball with the turn towards cover point
flighted on leg stump, drives it down to long-on
flatter delivery on middle and leg, worked to square leg for a quick single
nice turn from off stump line, Mushy defends on off off the back foot
pitched up on off now, driven straight to cover
full on off again, turned to midwicket this time
quicker one on middle stump, makes room and works it to leg for one
fullish on off stump, swept with the turn to deep square leg for one
full delivery on off stump, driven down easily to long-off
on middle and leg, turned down to long on
comes down the track and drives it inside out over the covers in the air for one
length ball on middle and leg, helped with the turn to deep midwicket
touch back of length and flat on off stump, bottom edge goes to point
full on off and middle, drives it down to long on for one
some room outside off, he cuts off the back foot to point
comes down the track to make it a full toss and gets an edge to short third man
googly comes in towards middle and leg, helped to deep square leg
turning in to Shakib now, pushed down to long on for one
flatter delivery on middle stump, bat comes down just in time to help it to midwicket
fullish on off stump, driven straight to cover
pitched up again, he drives it down to long off now
keeps a bit low as it's well outside off, Mushy cuts off the back foot to deep point
flight and turn from off stump, helped to point
pitched up outside off, driven firmly to deep cover for two in the gap
on leg stump now, swept against the turn to short fine leg
gets the sweep away this time, pitched up on leg, swept from the middle of the bat, in the air and wide of short fine leg for four
length delivery just outside off, pushed to cover point
gifts a full toss on the pads, steered to deep midwicket for one
good length ball outside off, slow offcutter and it's helped to point off the back foot
dangerously close to off stump, offcutter again and it's steered late to third man
offcutter on the pads now, helped with the angle to fine leg for one
slower one on the off stump, it's full and Shakib blocks it in the crease
length delivery outside off is steered straight to cover point
shortish on middle stump, pulled in the air to deep midwicket, reaches the fielder after a bounce
fullish delivery on off stump, he comes down and drives it long off
length delivery on middle stump, worked straight to square leg
turning in from just outside off, he cuts it late, very close to the keeper and towards third man. Good bounce too
the partnership is broken, very good catch by Tahir! Mushy slog-swept the full delivery from middle stump to the leg side, Tahir ran in from long on and took a sharp catch while diving forward
turning in from off stump, driven down to long on for one
bouncer angled in towards the batsman, he ducks under it
accurate delivery on middle stump, Sabbir defends it back
full on off now, driven straight to cover
full and on the pads now, deflects away towards short fine leg for a leg bye
back of length and angling in, bottom edge to the keeper after a bounce
short ball now outside off, pulled towards midwicket off the back foot
he sends this one down leg, worked away to short fine leg for a quick one
flatter delivery outside off, some room, Sabbir cuts and misses
he plays the short of length ball early and lands a few feet short of midwicket
worked past midwicket now off the back foot with the turn to deep midwicket
comes down for the full delivery and pushes it down to long on
length delivery on off stump, he presses forward and blocks
short ball with room outside off, slams it off the back foot past point for one. Score reaches triple figures
length delivery outside off, heaves on the leg side with an edge to deep midwicket
shuffles to off and works the back of length ball from outside off to midwicket
slow offcutter outside off, Sabbir pokes his bat gently and gets an edge to third man for two as the fielder slides to his left to save two
accurate delivery, coming in towards off and middle and Sabbir defends on the back foot
the angle does it, Sabbir is bowled! Morris brought the ball in from wide of the crease, it angled in sharply and went through the gate to rattle middle and leg. Six down
length delivery on the pads, worked to midwicket for one
googly first ball, he leans forward for a drive and gets an inside edge to leg
much fuller on off, driven off the middle to long-off this time
pitched up middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
turns the googly in, helped off the back foot to fine leg
flighted and full well outside off, driven nicely to cover
he makes room, gets it in the zone outside off and slams it over the covers for a four!
fullish on the stumps, driven down to mid on and a fumble there concedes a quick single
short and wide, lots of room and he slams that well over point in the gap for four!
almost in the block hole at 139kph, worked away to midwicket for one
length delivery on off, pushed down gently to mid on
wider outside off now, pretty full and it's driven straight to cover
bouncer down the leg side, called a wide
in the block hole on off, blocked on the off side to cover

loud appeal for lbw, finger goes up and the batsman reviews it! the ball turned in from length, Shakib leaned forward to defend and was hit in front of middle and leg after the ball pitched on middle, HawkEye says umpire's call and the decision stays. Big wicket as Shakib goes
googly first ball, it comes in and inside edge goes to leg in the gap
stifled appeal as the batsman sticks his pad out, the ball deflects off that to slip and they appeal for a catch. Somehow
drives the full toss on off down to long off for one
full and outside off, driven with the turn to deep cover
presses forward now and blocks the ball outside off
accurate length delivery on off stump, defends on the back foot
touch wider outside off, he cuts it late towards slip
length delivery just around off, pushed to cover
full delivery now outside off, pushed straight to cover
hardly any time for the batsman to duck under that quick bouncer. Almost loses his balance, QDK giggles
only a tentative drive off a full toss back to the bowler, deflects to non-striker but no time for a run
and slides that down the leg side
shorter one, just outside off, an inside edge as he looks to defend, the ball trickles to the off side
angles it in towards middle and off, defended towards midwicket
short of length ball on off stump, opens the face and guides that to backward point for a single, a diving Rossouw can't stop the run
short ball that sits up, pulled away authoritatively to the midwicket boundary, terrific hit from Nasir
goes for the yorker, not as full as he wanted, that one swings in towards middle, driven to the right of the bowler
short ball is too high for the umpire's liking, another wide
pitched up and that is blocked to the off side
length ball just outside off, 134kph, guided towards cover point
pushed towards short cover off the front foot this time
full and outside off, squeezed out towards cover point
again it is blocked towards cover point, tight over so far from Rabada
five-for on debut! Rabada bowls a slower short ball down the leg side, Mortaza looks to work that away behind square, can only help it along to the keeper, de Kock moves to his left and snaps that up
angled in towards the pads, batsman can't get bat on it and the ball rolls to the leg side
back of length outside off, cuts it square to point
fullish now outside off, drives it straight to cover
offcutter towards off stump now, he slices it to third man for one
missed it! 131kph, that missed the inside edge after the ball cut in and just missed the off stump too
edged and four! Back of length outside off, Jubair pokes and gets a thick outside edge flying past the slip region for four. Nobody there
lbw appeal as the full toss hits him on the pad in front of leg, umpire waits and then says no. Was probably going down leg with the angle
tucks the ball from around off to the leg side for one
short and wide outside off now, he only chases it tentatively and misses
short ball down the leg side, batsman doesn't look too comfortable but it's a wide
too quick for him this time, full and wide outside off, beats him by the time bat comes down
141kph, good bounce now from length outside off, he pokes and misses again. QDK collects near his left shoulder

in the block hole, and bowled! Number six for Rabada as he pitched that one on middle, rolled his fingers over it and it went through to hit the leg stump. Jubair had no clue what was happening in this over
short ball down the leg side, no need to duck as it goes for a wide
makes Mustafizur look awkward with a short ball towards the ribs, he defends somehow
pretty full outside off, drilled to cover
short ball angled in now, worked with a soft pull to deep square leg but he says no for the single
full toss on the pads, steered away with the angle right in between deep fine leg and deep midwicket for four!
full on off now, slammed down uppishly to long-on. Decides against the run again
short ball now outside off, hammered with a pull to the midwicket boundary. Cracking sound from the bat
last ball is blocked towards point as it was full outside off, he has no choice but to say no again
flattish on off stump, defends off the back foot
googly turns away from off, he pokes and misses
turning in from of stump now, he blocks it back
full delivery on off, pushed to cover now
quicker and fuller on off, worked to midwicket by closing the face of the bat
round the wicket for the last ball, it turns away from well outside off and is left
too wide and short outside off, slammed to deep cover but no single taken
goes on the back foot to pull to midwicket now
half-tracker on middle and leg, pulled to deep midwicket
well outside off, short again and it's cut late to short third man
goes in the crease to help the ball with the turn to short fine leg
flighted and full outside off, driven down just past Duminy for one and that's the 150 as well
comes down and drives the fullish ball to cover
too full from Tahir, Nasir slams it straight down the ground, over long on for a clean six
full again outside off, pushed into the covers
comes down again to take the ball on the full, drives it in the air towards deep cover, one taken
turning in from well outside off, Mustafizur defends with a forward lean. The crowd cheers
he goes back this time, lets it turn and blocks. Louder cheer from the crowd
pretty wide outside off, he chases with a cut and misses
flat and short outside off again, keeps low as Nasir misses again
cuts nicely this time as he got some room and came back quickly for the second. Fumble at third man also helped
charges down and drives to long-on, decides to take one
but he gives a full toss and it's driven down to long off, Nasir says no for the single
full outside off, pushed straight to short cover
length delivery just outside off, steers it pat point to third man, no run taken
nice angle from Morris, goes through the batsman. He came down, made room, but the ball came in and went between him and the stumps
it's over now, Morris gets his second and Nasir is bowled! He shuffled across completely, went down on a knee to scoop it over short fine leg but missed completely and Morris did not

inn2.comm: back of length ball just outside off, QDK defends it towards cover
attempts a yorker and it goes down the leg side off the shoe for four leg byes. Fine leg is in the circle
135.8kph, right on middle stump now, QDK gets behind it and defends to leg
fuller delivery on off and middle, pushed down to mid on with a straight bat
solid defence for the fuller delivery outside off to cover
more towards middle and it's worked off the back foot to short fine leg
length delivery on middle, steered to leg for one
bit of flight on off stump, Amla leans forward and blocks
touch shorter and turning towards middle and leg, Amla goes back to help it to deep square leg and comes back quickly for the second
towards middle and leg again, clipped off the pads to deep square leg. Direct hit at keeper's end gave a small chance for overthrows, they decide against it
length delivery on middle stump, blocked on the leg side
wider outside off now, driven nicely into the covers
length delivery angling away from outside off, Amla lets it go
hint of movement as it comes in towards the pads, bit too much towards leg as Amla cashes in with a beautiful flick, races away to midwicket. Those wrists!
that was his cutter with some extra bounce, surprised Amla as he got a thick edge towards point
beats the outside edge, crowd comes alive as QDK pokes and misses outside off
straighter delivery on middle stump, he defends to short midwicket
this one comes in sharply towards middle stump, Mustafizur almost appeal for lbw but there was an inside edge onto the pad
gets room outside off, it's back of length too and Amla crunches that square of the wicket off the back foot for four!
fuller on off and middle, clipped to deep midwicket for one
length delivery outside off is driven down to long off
sharp turn for the quicker delivery as it hits the pad in front of leg
steers the slightly slower one from middle and leg to midwicket for one
some room outside off and it's cut straight to point
angles the length ball away from outside off, he defends to point
touch fuller outside off, Amla lets it go to the keeper
back of length outside off, punched to cover point
absolutely full now outside off, Amla steers it to cover point
back of length outside off with the angle, left easily
beats him finally! This one pitched just around off, moved away from the batsman as he presented the full face of the bat
QDK slams the first ball outside off with a big drive, gets an inside edge just past the stumps to fine leg
touch short of length outside off, Amla hops back to whip it down to mid on
the captain gets his counterpart! Amla shuffled across towards off and exposed his stumps, clipped the ball late from off but straight to short fine leg
that ball keeps low after it pitched on off and middle and went straight. Faf got enough bat on it
125kph, too short, Faf stays back and swivels that behind square on the leg side in the huge gap as he had enough time to choose his shot
127.5kph, back of length outside off, Faf defends it back
that's too wide and QDK drives it nicely between cover point and point for two
swinging yorker on off stump, QDK defends it back
full and outside off, slammed with a cross-bat from the middle, but straight to deep midwicket
angles it away from back of length, Faf leaves
towards off stump now, Faf goes back, covers his stumps and defends solidly
124kph, slightly slower and Faf almost pokes at that one as it angles away from outside off
high back lift for the length delivery on off, but pushed to cover
short ball from leg towards off, QDK pulls but doesn't get enough to send that for four, gets two as there's a fielder in the deep
118kph, not much pace on that, not that short either as QDK pulls again and gets an edge towards wide slip
offcutter from middle to off, he watches carefully and defends this time
shuffles to off, gets a short of length ball and swivels it to deep backward square leg
well outside off, Faf guides it late to third man for one
shortish outside off, punched back towards cover
cuts the short ball fiercely off the back foot, Mashrafe dives at cover point to his right to stop with one hand
comes down the track and defends it back
presses forward and blocks the ball towards cover
beaten! Touch quicker, on length outside off with turn as well to go past the edge
comes down again to block it before it turns
short ball with room outside off, slammed off the back foot and a good save at point with a dive to the left
back of length delivery on leg now, QDK defends it close to him
shuffles to off, MM pitches it up outside off, QDK slogs and gets a bottom edge rolling to the keeper
connects, and gets it going in the gap for four! He charged down the track this time and drove the ball firmly past the diving mid-off fielder for a powerful four
fullish on middle and leg, clipped to square leg with the wrists
slower around off and he cuts it late to third man for one
fullish on middle, helped to deep midwicket with the wrists for one
full on middle and leg again, turned to midwicket for one
well outside off, cuts it to cover point
fuller towards off now, clipped down to long on easily
length delivery outside off, Faf lets it go
closer to off stump, pushes it to cover now
QDK gets a short ball, he pivots on the back foot and pulls that wide of deep midwicket for a one-bounce four. He wants to finish things off soon
slower one on the pads, pushes it to midwicket
he pre-meditated this one - put his front foot across towards off and whipped that with a pull to the square leg boundary for another four
goes down the ground this time, doesn't get the middle of the bat after the ball pitched outside off, but mid-on is in and the ball rolls away for four
clips the ball down to long on now from length
back of length ball on off is turned away to deep midwicket easily. 14 from that over
gets room with a full delivery outside off and Faf drives it nicely, inside out, over the covers for a confident four
this one slides in towards middle and leg, Faf makes room and pushes down to mid on
full delivery on leg now, clips it to deep midwicket
comes down the track and helps the ball with the turn to square leg
turns on the back foot this time for the short ball, opens up and smacks that behind square on the leg side for four more
fullish outside off, driven down to long on for an easy one and he keeps strike
QDK has given a catch to cover! It was pitched up outside off, QDK saw room and drove it in the air, but straight to Sabbir Rahman. Sharp catch as the ball was travelling fast
pitched up on the stumps, he blocks it on off
wider on the off side, driven straight to cover point
presses forward and blocks this one
full again on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
this one came in with the angle and RR blocked it back
starts with a googly that turns in and hits him on the pad outside leg, Faf didn't pick it at all
pitched up outside off, driven inside out over the covers towards deep cover. Reaches him after a bounce
bit of turn from middle and leg, helped behind square on leg
full delivery outside off, driven straight to cover
turns the full delivery from off down to long on
googly goes towards off from middle, helped down to long on for one
length ball around off and Faf paddle-scoops it fine on the leg side for two
flatter and quicker on off, defends on the off side
length delivery with some turn outside off, nudges it to point for one
drives the full ball from outside off to point
opens up a bit more and drives the full one to cover this time
length delivery turning away from off, worked off the back foot to square leg for one
clears mid-off for a four! Got a full and flighted delivery on off, he made room and lofted it straight over mid off
flighted on middle now, driven down to long on this time
quicker googly goes towards leg and it deflects off the pad fine for one

loud appeal for lbw as the turn beats RR, umpire says no and Mashrafe asks for a review. Ball pitched on middle and came in sharply, went past the bat and hit him on the back pad in front of leg. Umpire's call on hitting the stumps, so the decision stays
full toss is struck down to long on for an easy one
back of length on middle, turned to the leg side for one, to long on
fullish outside off, pushed back to the bowler
sharp turn and low bounce almost gets Faf! He made room for the short of length ball, but it came in and he got an inside edge to leg
comes down this time and pushes to cover
length delivery is driven down to the bowler on the leg side
goes back and helps the ball with the turn to deep midwicket for one
starts with a googly from well outside off, Faf goes back and defends to leg
full toss outside off, but Faf mistimes it over the covers in the gap for two
straighter one well outside off, he shuffles a long way across and clips it to square leg
short ball coming in, he swats on the leg side and gets a top edge to the leg side. Luckily for him it didn't carry to deep midwicket
another short ball, it stays low too and Faf manages to pull it to deep midwicket for two
goes in the crease again to help the ball to short fine leg for a quick single
turning into the batsman and it's helped to midwicket for a quick single. Faf somehow made it at bowler's end
pitched up on middle, RR defends on the leg side
errs on the leg side now, RR steers it to square leg for one
stays deep in the crease and punches the ball to deep cover
in the air, just wide of backward square leg. The short ball turned in, Faf scooped it on the leg side and it landed not too far from two fielders in the ring
almost in the block hole on off, blocked back
slides it in and Faf goes back to work it to leg for one
pitched up outside off, swept with the turn to deep square leg
angled in towards middle stump, Faf defends off the back foot
towards the pads now, he comes forward this time and flicks it in the air, against the turn for four
appeal for caught behind down the leg side, Mushfiqur appeals but the umpire calls it a wide
makes room and steers the ball to cover
appeal for lbw as the incoming ball hits him well outside leg, deflects to third man for one
deceives Faf with a cutter that pitched well outside leg, somewhat stopped on Faf and an edge went towards mid off
well outside off this time and left alone easily
another one left for the keeper outside off as it angles away
outside the off stump, back of length and it's mistimed to point
angles it in towards off, not too wide but Faf lets it go
sharp turn gets the ball in towards the pads, helped to midwicket
presses forward this time and blocks the length ball
dances down this time to take it on the full and crashes that over the covers for a powerful four. Mid-off was in too
leans forward and steers the ball to third man
leans forward and blocks the ball to leg
cross-batted heave on the leg side, Mashrafe gets a hand to it at short midwicket but the ball deflects away for two
back of length on off, he defends it back
full on the pads well outside leg, Mustafizur appeals as if it hit him in front of middle
full outside off now, steered to point
short ball this time and RR pulls that in the gap with some power, wide of fine leg for four!
full outside off now, RR pushes the ball to cover
overpitched on the pads, flicked away wide of fine leg for two in the gap
turns it in from outside off, worked down to long on off the back foot
sharp turn as the ball squares RR after pitching around off and strikes the thigh pad just around off
sweeps the ball against the turn this time to deep fine leg
length delivery on off is blocked back
works the length delivery to leg now
goes back and works the ball that is turning in to deep midwicket
turning in a bit from outside off, Faf defends to leg
takes a step down now and helps the ball to long on
charges down and then steers the ball from outside leg to deep midwicket
punches the short of length ball from outside off, looks like it was dropped at short cover by Mashrafe
too full outside off and that's lofted inside out, over the covers in the gap for four
too slow and well outside off now, Faf crunches that wide of short third man, in the gap for four more
length delivery outside off is defended back
this won't take much time, RR came down a bit and took it on the full to tonk that against the spin with a slog-sweep over wide long on for six!
goes back and defends the straighter delivery to midwicket
drives the fuller delivery to cover from outside off
goes back and pushes the ball down to long on
tuning towards leg from leg stump, worked to deep midwicket easily and that's Faf's 16th ODI fifty
quicker and fuller on off, driven down to long on
112kph, slower on middle stump and RR defends it to cover
in the block hole on middle now, RR defends and it goes to leg
drives the length delivery on off straight to cover
wider delivery outside off, RR swipes it to third man for one
appeal for lbw as MM angles the ball in, Faf misses and is struck in front of leg, going down leg
bit of flight on middle and leg, he defends it to off
goes back this time and punches it down to log off
length delivery is turned to the leg side, wide of deep midwicket for two
well outside off and it's driven against the turn into the covers. That was a googly
full delivery just outside of, he reverse sweeps and gets a bottom edge to short third man
steers the ball to leg now and says no for the single, Faf runs back
nudges the length delivery from outside of to backward point for one
pushes the length ball from leg back to the bowler
touch short of length on the stumps and RR defends it off the back foot
touch outside off and RR steers that late to third man for one
122kph, fullish cutter outside off, Faf waits and edges it intentionally at the last moment to steer it fine on off for four
drives the full ball down to mid off now
flighted, juicy, lollipop kind of full toss on leg and Rossouw smashes that to the wide long-on boundary for four
googly turns away from off, pushed down easily to long off
googly turns in from length, Faf unleashes a Test-like block with a forward lean
flights it on middle now with little turn, Faf blocks again
levels the scores by sweeping that overpitched googly from middle stump to the wide long on boundary for a four. It went high, but was well in the gap to land safe
drives the full delivery straight to cover
poor delivery outside off with room and Rossouw cuts that past point towards the boundary
